As the grounded defenders discuss thier plans and observations of 
Cyclonus=
' movements and tactics, the host of minion invaders began to 
lift away, c=
limbing higher into the very sky that they had so recently 
appeared from. =


Shrinking from terrible death bringers they slowly become smaller and 
sm=
aller as the distance steals thier size and definition. 

Without oposition=
 the mighty minions army moves away, in the direction 
of the now undefende=
d ark, leaving behind the devastation of the Black 
Fortress and its envior=
ns!
